name: Pixelformer Lite
description:
Pixelformer Lite is a colorful arcade game where you have to move left and right to navigate through the levels and collect all the diamonds. Collect pixels to increase your score and multiplier. The higher your multiplier, the higher your score!

Every level is a different puzzle with new routes and obstacles to beat. Can you earn all the stars and reach the end?

Features

  • Hand crafted, colorful and challenging levels
  • Be creative and use the sides of the screen to go from one side to the other instantly, horizontally and vertically
  • Collect all pixels to earn 3 stars
  • Collect all diamonds to finish the level
  • Many obstacles that require timing and finesse to pass
  • Score multiplier that runs out when you stop collecting pixels
  • Scoreboard to keep track of your progress
